summary: Makes a few tweaks to the skills tree..
descriptionHtml:
Comments and pointers and requests are happily accepted :D


Enchanting Revisited


Several tweaks have been made to the Enchanting skill tree:


-General Description of the skill has been changed.




*Enchanter(1/5) changed to Enchanting Proficiency(1/5)
-Inner workings remain the same.

*Soul Squeezer changed to Ethereal Conduit
- Description of the Skill changed.

- Value of Gem recharge changed from a set value of 250 to a
  Multiply Value of 1.2

- Skill level requirement upped from 20 to 35.



*Soul Siphon changed to Soul Tap
- Description of the skill changed.

- Increased return on kill from 5% to 20% of maximum soul size.

- Tacked on a Soul Gem Recharge value of 1.3 so stacked with \"Ethereal Conduit\" sould gems should now provide %50 more energy than before.

- Skill level requirement upped from 40 to 60.


*Corpus Enchanter
- Description changed to reflect proper values.

- Doubled the values this perk provides for 50% bonus to health,stamina, and magicka enchantments.



*Extra Effect changed to Master of the Law of Firsts
- Description Changed

- Tacked on a Modify Enchantment Power Multiply Value of 1.5, so all Enchantments are 50% more effective.



It does NOT steal your perk points :3
Tested by: Peterkeller
author: RickyThatsMe
